title: BRIEF-Seacor Marine Announces $56.9 Million Private Placement Of Common Stock
text:
SEACOR Marine Holdings Inc:
* SEACOR MARINE ANNOUNCES $56.9 MILLION PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF COMMON STOCK
* SEACOR MARINE - SUBSCRIPTION AGREEMENT FOR PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF ABOUT 2.8 MILLION SHARES OF STOCK AT $20.00/SHARE
* SEACOR MARINE - CO, CARLYLE GROUP AGREED TO EXCHANGE $50 MILLION OF SEACOR MARINEâ€™S OUTSTANDING 3.75% CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE DECEMBER 2022
* SEACOR MARINE - CO, CARLYLE GROUP ALSO AGREED TO AMEND NOTES THAT WILL REMAIN OUTSTANDING TO INCREASE COUPON FROM 3.75% PER ANNUM TO 4.25% PER ANNUM
* SEACOR MARINE - CO, CARLYLE GROUP ALSO AGREED TO AMEND NOTES TO EXTEND MATURITY OF NOTES BY 12 MONTHS TO DECEMBER 2023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
